title: What are some examples of information and communication technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology has revolutionized the way people do business. Rather than rely solely on face-to-face communication, company owners and their employees have a wide variety of technology-mediated resources at their disposal. Computerized communication allows immediate access to customers, business associates, vendors and employees in other parts of the country and even the world. Examine the many technology tools available to small business owners to see which of them you can benefit from using. Examine the forms of technology-mediated communication that are essential to your small business. Email. You must answer your email or hire someone to do it for you. ...Texting. Texting has become the most personal form of business communication. ...Instant Messaging. ...Social Networking. ...Tweeting. ...Blogs. ...Video Conferencing.

You are going to have to be more specific. All of the following fall somewhere in the spectrum of Information and Communication Technology: - Semaphore towers.- Signal lights- Morse Code- The Internet.- The original telephone.- The telegraph.- Facebook- Smart phones.- Networking hardware- Two cans and a piece of string...
